metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12482 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
OCS Inventory 2.4.1 contains multiple SQL injections in the search engine.Authentication is needed in order to exploit the issues.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.5+dfsg-1
ocsinventory-server - 2.5+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5+dfsg-1').
